aboutProject.description: This Unit Converter offers the following features:

features.title: Real-time Conversion
features.description: Instant calculations on input or unit changes.

features.title: Wide Unit Variety
features.description: Supports over 70 units across 16 categories (e.g., Area, Length, Temperature, etc.).

features.title: User-friendly Interface
features.description: Sleek, responsive design with Tailwind CSS, dark mode support, and full responsiveness.

features.title: Error Handling
features.description: Validates inputs and displays clear error messages.

features.title: Modular & Extensible
features.description: Built with React and TypeScript using a JSON-based structure for easy development.

features.title: Target Audience
features.description: Designed for scientific, engineering, and everyday users.
